title: Would you support it being hardcoded that each post is auto-deleted a year or two after it's posted? Personally I would, I don't want to think about this stuff hanging around twenty years down the road just waiting for vigilantes to take it out of context that I said brussel sprouts are disgusting but they're some new SJW cause by then.

author.bio: GM of +Clownworld +News +Commentary +Conspiracy +Christianity +Prolife +Conservatives +MAGA and a few others
author.bio_html: GM of +ClownWorld +News +Commentary +Conspiracy +Christianity +ProLife +Conservatives +MAGA and a few others

body: No I would really like the things I post to be a part of a historical archive of past available information. I would support that functionality available for users that do wish that though.
body_html: No I would really like the things I post to be a part of a historical archive of past available information. I would support that functionality available for users that do wish that though.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Only as an option that you can enable if you want. It's a really good idea but I don't think most people want their posts to get deleted.
body_html: Only as an option that you can enable if you want. It's a really good idea but I don't think most people want their posts to get deleted.

post.title: Would you support it being hardcoded that each post is auto-deleted a year or two after it's posted? Personally I would, I don't want to think about this stuff hanging around twenty years down the road just waiting for vigilantes to take it out of context that I said brussel sprouts are disgusting but they're some new SJW cause by then.

body: Nah, let it ride. They'll find some other way to send us to the gallows. Smiling at strangers will be a hate crime soon enough. Let em pin the cartoon frogs on us as well, and wear it as a badge of honor!
body_html: Nah, let it ride. They'll find some other way to send us to the gallows. Smiling at strangers will be a hate crime soon enough. Let em pin the cartoon frogs on us as well, and wear it as a badge of honor!

post.title: Would you support it being hardcoded that each post is auto-deleted a year or two after it's posted? Personally I would, I don't want to think about this stuff hanging around twenty years down the road just waiting for vigilantes to take it out of context that I said brussel sprouts are disgusting but they're some new SJW cause by then.

body:
Disagree. They taste like shut on their own.
They can be made to taste good with some effort, though. 

I prefer broccoli, which rates pretty good after just boiling it.
body_html:
Disagree. They taste like shut on their own. They can be made to taste good with some effort, though.

I prefer broccoli, which rates pretty good after just boiling it.
